resources.string: Unknown error
Error #%1$d: %2$s
No connection
You have already registered this adapter.
This adapter has not connected to cloud yet.\n\nPlease check its Internet connection.
This adapter has already been registered by another user.\n\nHe can share adapter with you.
Server experienced some issues.\n\nTry to connect later.
Invalid action was inserted.
Invalid actor value was inserted.
Bad type of aggregation function was requested.
Invalid time zone was inserted.
Your seesion has expired.\n\nPlease log in again.
Invalid location type was inserted.
Invalid interval was inserted.
Invalid icon was inserted.
Invalid email or role was inserted.
This version of application is no longer supported.\n\nPlease download new version.
Damaged XML message received.\n\nPlease try again.
You have low rights to perform this action.\n\nAsk owner to grant you higher rights.
Bad sensor ID or type was inserted.
Bad token or email was inserted.
Requested object was not found.\n\nPlease try again.
This user name is not available.
This password is not safe.
This name or email cannot be utilized.
Please activate your account.
Email or username does not exist.
Wrong password.
This account is temporary locked.
This provider is not available.
This request is not supported by server.
Internet connection is not available.\n\nPlease check your settings.
Cannot connect to server.\n\nPlease try again later.
XML parsing issue occured.\n\nPlease try again later.
Cannot create or use socket.\n\nPlease try again later.
Invalid certificate.
Unknown host.
